name: City Boss
description:
City Boss - Idle City Clicker Game - Build your own empire

Best Idle Tapping City Builder Game - Offline - FREE

Build your own empire. Become a city builder tycoon boss by managing your city building company. Play your city construction building idle tapping game. Build your city, earn more cash. Ready to be become rich, and get tons of money from your city.

- Buy buildings
- Tap buildings to get coins
- Dozen of upgrades
- Play anywhere - Offline play, earn coins while you sleep - No internet connection needed
- Unlimited Gameplay

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/CityBossGame
